malt.translation[0].definitions[0].defin: grain, usually barley, that has been kept in water for a time and then dried. It is used for making beer, whisky etc.
malt.translation[0].definitions[1].defin: a drink made from milk, malt, and ice cream that usually has something else such as chocolate added
malt.translation[0].definitions[1].examp: a cheeseburger and a chocolate malt
malt.translation[0].definitions[2].defin: a type of high-quality whisky from Scotland
